title: Parade 88 -Farnborough 1970
brief_description: A report on the planes and displays to be seen at the 1970 Air Show. The Hawker Harrier, the only high speed jet air-craft that can take off from a ninety degree angle is profiled as well as the inimitable Red Arrows.
